title: Readout of the President’s Call with Prime Minister Narendra Modi of India | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
December 08, 2015

 



Readout of the President’s Call with Prime Minister Narendra Modi of India





	President Obama spoke by phone today with Prime Minister Narendra Modi of India to discuss the ongoing Paris climate conference.  Both leaders emphasized their personal commitment to secure a strong climate change agreement this week and their interest in our countries’ working together to achieve a successful outcome.  The President, on behalf of the American people, accepted the Prime Minister's condolences for the loss of life in the San Bernardino shootings last week.
